item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为中美之争对全球经济增长构成 "重大 "风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）亚太部主任克里希纳-斯里尼瓦桑（Krishna Srinivasan）周五表示，由于中美摩擦重燃，该组织认为全球经济增长面临 "重大下行风险"。【原文：The International Monetary Fund sees “significant downside risks” to global growth due to renewed frictions between the US and China, the fund’s Director of the Asia and Pacific Department Krishna Srinivasan said on Friday.】

item.title: 三星将在亚太经合组织峰会上展示其首款三折手机
item.description: 三星电子公司将于本月晚些时候在韩国举行的亚太经济合作组织峰会上推出备受瞩目的三折智能手机，届时世界各国领导人和全球政要将齐聚一堂。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. will unveil its highly-anticipated trifold smartphone when world leaders and global dignitaries gather at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in South Korea later this month.】

item.title: 埃及提高汽油和柴油价格，作为国际货币基金组织主导的救助计划的一部分
item.description: 埃及将燃料价格提高了 13%，这是埃及根据国际货币基金组织支持的改革削减国家补贴的最新举措。【原文：Egypt raised fuel prices by as much as 13%, in the latest move to trim state subsidies in line with International Monetary Fund-backed reforms.】

item.title: 韩美尚未就与 3,500 亿美元基金相关的外汇问题达成协议
item.description: 韩国仍在与美国进行密集会谈，以确定其 3,500 亿美元投资承诺的最终细节，包括可能的货币互换额度，旨在保护亚洲国家免受潜在金融动荡的影响。【原文：South Korea remains in intensive talks with the US to iron out final details of its $350 billion investment pledge, including a possible currency swap line aimed at safeguarding the Asian nation from potential financial instability.】

item.title: 欧洲央行同意政策状况良好，但对未来看法不一
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）将她关于利率处于 "良好位置 "的口头禅带到了华盛顿，并得到了几乎所有同来华盛顿的同事的支持。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde has taken her mantra that interest rates are in a “good place” to Washington and received backup from nearly all her colleagues that also made the trip.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普加征关税，马来西亚 5.2% 的经济增长仍超出预期
item.description: 马来西亚的经济增长在第三季度出人意料地加速，各行各业都取得了增长，出口也抵御住了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收更高关税的压力。【原文：Malaysia’s growth unexpectedly accelerated in the third quarter, with the economy firing across all sectors and exports defying US President Donald Trump’s imposition of higher tariffs.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮引发尼日利亚数十亿美元数据中心竞赛
item.description: 尼日利亚正吸引数百万美元投入新的数据中心，这得益于其精通技术的年轻人贪婪的上网习惯，以及利用人工智能推动下一波数字经济繁荣的努力，从而巩固了其作为非洲顶级技术中心之一的地位。【原文：Nigeria is drawing millions of dollars into new data centers, propelled by the voracious online habits of its young, tech-savvy population and a push to harness artificial intelligence to power the next wave of its digital boom, reinforcing its position as one of Africa’s top technology hubs.】

item.title: 被选民唾弃的里夫斯希望赢得英国债券市场的青睐
item.description: 雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的第一份预算案使她成为英国几十年来最不受欢迎的财政大臣。她打赌，她的第二份预算将赢得至少一个选区的青睐：债券市场。【原文：Rachel Reeves’ first budget helped make her Britain’s most unpopular chancellor of the exchequer in decades. She’s betting that her second will win favor with at least one constituency: the bond market.】

item.title: 调查显示澳大利亚西海岸谷物收成或将创纪录
item.description: 西澳大利亚州是澳大利亚最大的谷物生产州，由于天气强劲以及从畜牧业转向种植业，该州今年可能收获破纪录的作物，这有可能加剧全球小麦供应过剩的局面。【原文：Western Australia, the nation’s biggest grain-producing state, may harvest a record-breaking crop this year thanks to strong weather and a shift from livestock to cropping, potentially exacerbating a global wheat glut.】

item.title: 日元升值突破 1 美元兑 150 日元，为 10 月 6 日以来首次
item.description: 由于两家美国银行的不良贷款推动了全球对避险资产的需求，日元兑美元汇率从八个月来的最弱点反弹，突破了 150 点。【原文：The yen strengthened past the 150 level against the dollar, bouncing back from its weakest point in eight months as bad loans at two US banks drove global demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 五年期国债收益率降至 2024 年 10 月以来最低点
item.description: 由于对美国地区银行的担忧和挥之不去的贸易紧张局势助长了避险情绪，五年期国债收益率跌至一年低点。【原文：Five-year Treasury yields dropped to a one-year low as concerns surrounding US regional banks and lingering trade tensions fueled a flight to safety.】

item.title: 信贷和中美紧张局势引发担忧，铜价下跌
item.description: 铜和其他工业金属因对美国信贷质量的担忧和华盛顿与北京之间再度紧张的关系而回落。【原文：Copper and other industrial metals retreated on concerns about credit quality in the US and renewed tensions between Washington and Beijing.】

item.title: 比特币历史性覆灭后艰难寻找动力
item.description: 比特币在经历了长达一周的溃败，抹去了数千亿的数字资产价值之后，再次辜负了其作为安全港资产的美誉。【原文：After a week-long rout that erased hundreds of billions in digital-asset value, Bitcoin has again failed to live up to its billing as a safe harbor asset.】

item.title: 新加坡掉期利率将从三年低点回升
item.description: 交易商押注新加坡的掉期利率需要上升，以抵消预期的货币疲软。【原文：Traders are betting that Singapore’s swap rates will need to rise to offset an expected weakening of the currency.】

item.title: 美联储工作人员询问对冲基金1.4万亿美元国债堆积情况
item.description: 据美联储的研究人员称，开曼群岛的对冲基金在 2024 年底持有的国债比美国官方数据显示的要多，其持有量可能比报告的高出 1.4 万亿美元。【原文：Hedge funds in the Cayman Islands held more Treasuries at end-2024 than US official data show, with their ownership likely to be $1.4 trillion higher than reported, according to researchers at the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 尽管印度经济不景气，Infosys 和 Wipro 盈利增长依然强劲
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本反对党领袖称联合机会 "一半一半
item.description: 执政党自民党与反对党伊信（Ishin）组建新联盟的可能性各占一半，该党领导人周五表示，在议会投票决定谁将领导国家之前，关键谈判仍在继续。【原文：The likelihood of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party forming a new coalition with opposition party Ishin is 50-50, the leader of the smaller party said Friday, as key talks continue ahead of a parliamentary vote on who will lead the nation.】

item.title: 印度银行的贷款利润率将随着利率下调触底反弹
item.description: 包括 HDFC Bank Ltd. 和 ICICI Bank Ltd. 在内的印度银行的收益预计将表明，在央行最近的降息周期和旨在恢复经济增长的减税措施之后，利润率已经触底。【原文：Indian banks including HDFC Bank Ltd. and ICICI Bank Ltd. earnings are expected to signal that margins have bottomed out, after the central bank’s recent rate-cutting cycle and tax breaks aimed at reviving economic growth.】

item.title: 日本通过乐天交易获得今年收益率最高的日元债券
item.description: 乐天集团公司以 4.691% 的年内最高票面利率为当地债券定价，使日本信贷市场最清楚地看到了利率上升对企业借贷成本的影响。【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. priced a local bond at the year’s highest coupon of 4.691%, giving Japan’s credit market the clearest sign yet of the impact of rising rates on corporate borrowing costs.】

item.title: 据说瑞波实验室将牵头为 XRP 储备筹集 10 亿美元资金
item.description: 瑞波实验室公司（Ripple Labs Inc. ）正在牵头筹集至少 10 亿美元的资金，用于积累与该公司相关的数字代币 XRP，这表明近期的市场动荡并没有阻止加密货币重量级企业全力推进其商业计划。【原文：Ripple Labs Inc. is leading an effort to raise at least $1 billion to accumulate XRP, the digital token linked to the company, in a sign that the recent market tumult has not stopped cryptocurrency heavyweights from pursuing their business plans full-force.】

item.title: 任天堂的目标是到 3 月份生产 2,500 万台 Switch 2
item.description: 任天堂公司已要求供应商在2026年3月底之前生产多达2500万台Switch 2，这将使该公司的游戏机首年销量达到创纪录的水平，而这款游戏机已经达到了全球游戏业的最高水位。【原文：Nintendo Co. has asked suppliers to produce as many as 25 million units of the Switch 2 by the end of March 2026, setting the company up for record first-year sales of a console that’s already reached high-water marks for the global gaming sector.】

item.title: 通过 Lenskart IPO，"鲨鱼坦克 "评委佩尤什-班萨尔接近亿万富翁地位
item.description: 15 年多前，佩尤什-班萨尔（Peyush Bansal）与他在 LinkedIn 上结识的合作伙伴一起创办了眼镜制造商 Lenskart Solutions Ltd.，并将其发展成为价值数十亿美元的企业。现在，这位 41 岁的企业家和印度电视明星正准备大赚一笔。【原文：Peyush Bansal founded eyewear-maker Lenskart Solutions Ltd. more than 15 years ago with partners he met on LinkedIn and grew it into a multi-billion dollar business. Now the 41-year-old entrepreneur and Indian television star is in line for a windfall.】

item.title: 关注供应和中美紧张局势，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 由于投资者关注供应和中美贸易紧张局势重燃的后果，石油连续第三周下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a third weekly decline as investors focused on supply and the fallout of renewed US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 投资者等待未来首相出台政策，高市贸易停滞不前
item.description: 尽管有关新联盟的讨论支持了高市真奈竞选日本首相，但投资者希望看到政策的具体细节，然后再进一步押注高市真奈将继续主张货币和财政刺激政策。【原文：Even as talk of a new coalition bolsters Sanae Takaichi’s bid to become Japan’s prime minister, investors want to see specifics on policy before they pile further into bets that she will keep advocating for monetary and fiscal stimulus.】

item.title: 香港财务总监称约 200 家公司计划首次公开募股
item.description: 香港最高金融官员表示，200 多家公司正在排队等待在香港上市，为这个亚洲中心城市今年的股票销售增添了强劲动力。【原文：More than 200 firms are lining up to go public in Hong Kong, adding to a strong year for stock sales in the Asian hub, the city’s top finance official said.】

item.title: 中国出口繁荣难阻经济创年内最差季度
item.description: 尽管出口蓬勃发展，但中国经济上季度的增长速度可能是一年来最慢的，中国共产党可能会在下周召开的一次重要会议上通过倡导提高消费来纠正这种脱节。【原文：China’s economy likely expanded at the slowest in a year last quarter despite a boom in exports, a disconnect the Communist Party may move to rectify by championing higher consumption when it convenes for a key meeting next week.】

item.title: 瑞银、汇丰积极进军价值 8 万亿美元的台湾财富市场
item.description: 随着台湾政府放宽资金管理规定，以利用蓬勃发展的个人财富，全球银行竞相在台湾快速增长的 8 万亿美元财富市场分一杯羹。【原文：Global banks are racing to secure a piece of Taiwan’s rapidly growing $8 trillion wealth market as the government eases money-management regulations to capitalize on booming personal fortunes.】

item.title: 花旗银行向美联储出售阿根廷比索，作为财政部救援行动的一部分
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团周四向美联储出售了阿根廷比索，这是美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）为提振阿根廷货币和哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）政府所做的广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Citigroup Inc. sold Argentine pesos to the Federal Reserve on Thursday as part of US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s wide-ranging effort to buoy the currency and Javier Milei’s administration, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 奥地利 VIG 公司将以约 16 亿美元收购竞争对手 Nuernberger 公司
item.description: 奥地利维也纳保险集团同意收购德国竞争对手 Nuernberger Beteiligungs AG，交易价值约为 14 亿欧元（16 亿美元）。【原文：Austria’s Vienna Insurance Group AG agreed to buy German rival Nuernberger Beteiligungs AG in a deal valued at about €1.4 billion ($1.6 billion).】

item.title: 信贷担忧和中美紧张局势引发金银创纪录
item.description: 黄金和白银触及历史高位，原因是对经济信贷质量的担忧和中美摩擦加剧增强了避险需求，同时投资者纷纷押注美联储可能在今年大幅降息。【原文：Gold and silver touched all-time highs as fears about credit quality in the economy and heightened US-China frictions strengthened demand for havens, while investors piled into bets that the Federal Reserve could deploy an outsized rate cut this year.】
